source: ちょっと難しいかもしれないけど、やってみる
seed: It might be a bit difficult, but I'll give it a try.

casual_25.new_translation: Might be tough, but I'll give it a shot
casual_25.reverse_translation: ちょっと難しいかもしれないけど、やってみる

casual_50.new_translation: It could be a challenge, but I'll give it a go
casual_50.reverse_translation: ちょっと難しいかもしれないけど、やってみる

casual_75.new_translation: Might be a tough one, but I'm gonna give it a shot
casual_75.reverse_translation: ちょっと難しいかもしれないけど、とりあえずやってみる

casual_100.new_translation: This could be challenging, but I'll give it a try
casual_100.reverse_translation: 難しいかもしれないけど、やってみる

polite_25.new_translation: It may be somewhat challenging, but I will attempt to do so.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 少し難しいかもしれませんが、やってみます。

polite_50.new_translation: I acknowledge that it could be somewhat challenging, but I am willing to give it a try.
polite_50.reverse_translation: ちょっと難しいかもしれないですが、やってみます

polite_75.new_translation: I recognize that it may be somewhat challenging, but I am prepared to give it a try.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 多少難しいかもしれないが、やってみるつもりだ

polite_100.new_translation: I am cognizant that it may pose a certain degree of difficulty; nonetheless, I am willing to attempt it.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 多少の困難さがあるかもしれませんが、やってみるつもりです。

business_25.new_translation: While it may present some challenges, I am willing to give it a try.
business_25.reverse_translation: いくつかの課題があるかもしれませんが、やってみます。

business_50.new_translation: Although it may pose certain difficulties, I am prepared to attempt it.
business_50.reverse_translation: それなりの困難が伴うかもしれませんが、やってみるつもりです。

business_75.new_translation: Notwithstanding potential challenges, I am willing to give it a try.
business_75.reverse_translation: 多少の困難が予想されますが、やってみるつもりです。

business_100.new_translation: Despite potential challenges, I am prepared to attempt it.
business_100.reverse_translation: 困難な点もあるかもしれませんが、試してみるつもりです。

source: すみません、割と急ぎなのでお願いできますか
seed: Sorry, it's a bit urgent, could you please?

casual_25.new_translation: I'm sorry, it's pretty urgent, could you do it for me?
casual_25.reverse_translation: すみません、結構急いでるんですが、手伝ってもらえますか？

casual_50.new_translation: Sorry, it's super urgent, can you help me out?
casual_50.reverse_translation: ごめん、めっちゃ急いでるんだけど、手伝ってくれない？

casual_75.new_translation: Sorry, it's super duper urgent, can you help a bro out?
casual_75.reverse_translation: ごめん、めっちゃ急いでるんだけど助けてくれない？

casual_100.new_translation: Sorry, it's hella urgent, can you hook a bro up?
casual_100.reverse_translation: 本当に急いでるんだけど助けてくれない？

polite_25.new_translation: I apologize, but would you be able to assist me with this at your earliest convenience?
polite_25.reverse_translation: 申し訳ありませんが、できるだけ早くこの件を手伝っていただけますか？

polite_50.new_translation: I apologize for the inconvenience, but I would be grateful if you could assist me with this at your earliest convenience.
polite_50.reverse_translation: ごめんなさい、しかし、この件について早急にご協力をいただけないでしょうか。

polite_75.new_translation: I apologize for any trouble this may have caused, but I'd greatly appreciate it if you could help me with this as soon as possible.
polite_75.reverse_translation: ご不便をおかけして申し訳ありませんが、ぜひとも早めにご協力をいただけますでしょうか。

polite_100.new_translation: I humbly apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and would be most grateful if you could assist me with this matter at your earliest convenience.
polite_100.reverse_translation: ご不便をおかけして申し訳ございませんが、どうぞよろしくお願いいたします。お手数ですが、お早めに対応いただけますでしょうか。

business_25.new_translation: I apologize, but I would greatly appreciate it if you could assist me with this matter at your earliest convenience.
business_25.reverse_translation: 申し訳ございませんが、どうかこの件について可能な限り早くご協力をお願いいたします。

business_50.new_translation: I apologize for the inconvenience, but I would be most grateful if you could assist me with this matter at your earliest convenience.
business_50.reverse_translation: ごめんなさい、もしよろしければ、この件についてできるだけ早く対応していただけますでしょうか。

business_75.new_translation: I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I would be extremely grateful if you could assist me with this matter at your earliest convenience.
business_75.reverse_translation: ご不便をおかけして申し訳ございませんが、こちらの件につきまして早急にご対応いただけますと幸いです。

business_100.new_translation: I extend my sincerest apologies for any potential inconvenience this may occasion, and I would be most appreciative if you could expedite assistance with this matter at your earliest opportunity.
business_100.reverse_translation: ご不便をおかけして大変申し訳ございませんが、なるべく早くにこの件についてご協力をいただけますと幸いです。

source: あんまり期待しないほうがいいと思う
seed: I think it's better not to expect too much

casual_25.reverse_translation: 期待しない方がいいんじゃないかな

casual_50.new_translation: You shouldn't expect a whole lot
casual_50.reverse_translation: そんなに期待しない方がいい

casual_75.reverse_translation: そんなに期待しないで

polite_25.new_translation: I think it's best not to expect too much.
polite_25.reverse_translation: あまり期待しない方がいいと思う

polite_50.new_translation: It would be prudent not to have overly high expectations.
polite_50.reverse_translation: あまり期待しすぎない方が賢明かと思います。

polite_75.new_translation: It would be wise to keep expectations in check.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 期待しすぎないことが賢明だろう

polite_100.new_translation: It would be prudent to maintain a realistic outlook.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 期待しすぎないようにすることが賢明です

business_25.new_translation: I wouldn't advise you to have very high expectations.
business_25.reverse_translation: あまり期待しすぎない方がいいと思います

business_50.new_translation: I would caution against having extremely high expectations.
business_50.reverse_translation: あまり高い期待を持たない方がいいと思います

business_75.new_translation: I would advise against setting unrealistically high expectations.
business_75.reverse_translation: 現実的に高すぎる期待を設定しないようにアドバイスいたします.

business_100.new_translation: It is advisable to exercise caution when establishing expectations that are excessively ambitious.
business_100.reverse_translation: 過度に高い期待を設定する際には注意を払うことが賢明です。

source: もし時間があれば、私が説明します
seed: I'll explain if I have time.

casual_25.new_translation: I will explain if I have the time
casual_25.reverse_translation: 時間があったら説明します

casual_50.new_translation: I'll explain if I've got a minute
casual_50.reverse_translation: 時間があったら説明する

casual_75.new_translation: I'll give you the lowdown if I get a chance
casual_75.reverse_translation: 時間があったら説明する

casual_100.new_translation: I'll hook you up with the scoop if I get the chance
casual_100.reverse_translation: もし機会があれば詳しいことを教える

polite_25.new_translation: If I have the time, I'd be happy to provide an explanation.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、喜んで説明させていただきます。

polite_50.new_translation: If I have the time, I would be more than happy to provide an explanation.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、ぜひ説明させていただきます。

polite_75.new_translation: If I have the time, I'd be delighted to offer an explanation.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、喜んで説明させていただきます。

polite_100.new_translation: If I were to have the time, I would be most pleased to provide an explanation.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、ぜひ説明させていただきたいと思います.

business_25.new_translation: If I've got some time, I'll be happy to explain.
business_25.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、喜んで説明します。

business_50.new_translation: If I have some spare time, I'd be more than happy to provide an explanation.
business_50.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、喜んで説明させていただきます。

business_75.new_translation: I would be delighted to offer an explanation should I have some available time.
business_75.reverse_translation: 時間があれば、ぜひ説明させていただきます。

business_100.new_translation: It would be my pleasure to provide an explanation if I have some available time.
business_100.reverse_translation: もし時間があったら説明させていただきます。

source: ちょっと体調悪くて、今日は早めに帰ります
seed: I'm not feeling well, so I'll head home early today.

casual_25.new_translation: I'm not feeling great, so I'm heading home early today.
casual_25.reverse_translation: ちょっと体調悪くて、今日は早めに帰ります

casual_50.new_translation: I'm feeling pretty crummy, so I'm gonna head home early today.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 気分が悪いので、今日は早めに帰ることにします。

casual_75.new_translation: I'm feelin' really down, so I'm gonna bail early today.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 気分が落ちているので、今日は早めに帰る。

casual_100.new_translation: I'm super down, so I'm outta here early today.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 気分がすごく落ちているので、今日は早く帰る。

polite_25.new_translation: I'm not feeling well, so I will be heading home early today.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 気分が悪いので、早めに帰宅します。

polite_50.new_translation: I am not feeling well, therefore I shall be returning home early today.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 調子が悪いので、今日は早めに帰ります。

polite_75.new_translation: I am not feeling well, therefore I shall be returning home early today.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 調子が悪いので、今日は早めに帰ります。

polite_100.new_translation: I am presently indisposed and, consequently, I shall be retiring to my residence at an earlier juncture today.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 私は現在気分が悪く、そのため今日は早めに帰宅することにいたします。

business_25.new_translation: I'm not feeling well, so I'll be heading home early today.
business_25.reverse_translation: ちょっと体調が悪くて、今日は早めに帰ります。

business_50.new_translation: I am not feeling well, so I will be leaving early today.
business_50.reverse_translation: 調子が悪いので、今日は早めに帰ります。

business_75.new_translation: I am not feeling well, so I shall be departing early today.
business_75.reverse_translation: 気分が悪いので、今日は早めに帰ります。

business_100.new_translation: I am presently experiencing a state of discomfort and therefore shall vacate the premises at an earlier juncture today.
business_100.reverse_translation: 私は現在体調が悪いため、今日は早めに帰らせていただきます。
